Name: Sanai
description:
Sanai is an artisan from Thailand who specializes in wood tableware and home décor. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of wood.

Sanai has been selling through NOVICA since 2018. This is his story:

"In 2008, my family and I moved to Chiang Mai and bought a small piece of land not far from the city. Most people in our community work in the wood furniture industry. I got my start in woodworking by carving a piece of discarded wood into a bowl shape. I realized I enjoyed wood carving and began to learn by helping people around my community. I found that there was so much wood waste from furniture processing, so I used it to make useful items. I also like to use wood from old houses or even pigsties, because I believe that every place has history and memories. I do not paint my woodwork because I want each piece to be unique."

"Recent changes to Thailand's export regulations for wooden handicrafts have increased our costs and impacted our sales. This microcredit will be incredibly helpful, allowing me to get a better price for high quality wood. Thank you for your support."
